attributes.title: are you gonna vote for this clown?
attributes.review:
-called people who were protesting against police brutality â€œthugsâ€ but people who stormed a state capital with guns because they wanted haircuts â€œgood peopleâ€
-use the phrase â€œwhen the looting starts, the shooting startsâ€ which has a racist history
-in july 2015 he falsely claimed that immigrants bring diseases into america â€œtremendous infectious disease is pouring across the borders. the united states has has become a dumping ground for mexico and, in fact, many other places of the worldâ€
-in june 2017 during a meeting talking about u.s. visas, trump said that people from haiti â€œall have aidsâ€ and that nigerian immigrants would never â€œgo back to their hutsâ€ after experiencing the united states
-in january 2018 at a bipartisan meeting discussing protections for immigrants from haiti, el salvador, and african countries, trump asked, â€œwhy are we having all these people from sh*thole countries come here?â€ he then went on to suggest we should accept more immigrants from countries such as norway instead
-in may 2018 at a meeting with reporters at the white house he said â€œthese arenâ€™t people, theyâ€™re animalsâ€ when referring to undocumented immigrants
-in september 2015 trump falsely suggested that syrian refuges could be isis fighters in disguise
-in march 2016 trump claimed â€œi think islam hates usâ€ in an interview with cnn
-the trump administration implemented a travel ban on people from five majority muslim countries after trump said â€œdonald j. trump is calling for a total and complete shutdown of muslims entering the united states until our countries representatives can figure out what the h3ll is going onâ€ at a rally in south carolina
-in 1973 trump got sued for refusing to rent to black people 
-in the 1980s trumps casinos were accused of hiding the black staff members when trump came to visit
-in 1989 trump took out a full page ad arguing for the death penalty for the central park five and was sued by the doj for discrimination 
-in 1991 trump said â€œblack guys counting my money! i hate it. the only kinds of people i want counting my money are short guys who wear yarmulkes everyday. i think that [black] guy is lazy. and itâ€™s probably not his fault, because laziness is a trait in blacks. it really isâ€ 
-in 1992 trumps casino was fined $200k for transferring black dealers of certain tables to appease racist patrons 
-in 1993 trump said that native american casinos shouldnt be allowed because â€œthey donâ€™t look like indians to meâ€
-in 2000 trump ran a series of attack ads against native american casinos saying they had committed crimes (with no proof)
-in 2004 trump fired a black contestant from â€œthe apprenticeâ€ for being over educated
-in 2010 trump argued in favor of segregating muslims in lower manhattan 
-in 2011 trump claimed that obama was born in kenya based on nothing but his skin color. he still hasnâ€™t apologized or renounced that claim
 
or was all of that taken out of context too?

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
